questions.text: What is the difference between a snow shovel and ice scraper?
answers: One shovels snow and the other scrapes ice
One scrapes snow and the other shovels ice
questions.answer: One shovels snow and the other scrapes ice

questions.text: What is more suitable to use on your windshield?
What is more suitable to use on your driveway?
What is more suitable to get snow off of your car?
Why is there a sharp metal tip on the end of a snow shovel?
answers: Can also be used as a weapon
To dig into tightly packed snow
Can also be used as a real shovel on dirt
questions.answer: To dig into tightly packed snow
